name: lingzhang-enterprise-website
description: 灵掌智能企业网站 - Vue 3.6 Vapor + Node.js + WebAssembly

scripts.dev: concurrently "npm run dev:server" "npm run dev:client" "npm run docs:dev" "npm run dev:manage"
scripts.build: npm run build:wasm && npm run build:client && npm run build:server && npm run build:docs && npm run build:manage
scripts.install:all: npm install && cd client && npm install && cd ../server && npm install && cd ../wasm && npm install && cd ../docs && npm install && cd ../manage && npm install
